    • showPersonEditDialog

      public boolean showPersonEditDialog(es.damdi.ismaelsg.adressappmavenjavefx.model.Person person)
      Opens a dialog to edit details for the specified person. If the user clicks OK, the changes are saved into the provided person object and true is returned.
      Parameters:
      person - the person object to be edited
      Returns:
      true if the user clicked OK, false otherwise.

    • getPersonFilePath

      public File getPersonFilePath()
      Returns the person file preference, i.e. the file that was last opened. The preference is read from the OS specific registry. If no such preference can be found, null is returned.
      Returns:
      person file path

    • setPersonFilePath

      public void setPersonFilePath(File file)
      Sets the file path of the currently loaded file. The path is persisted in the OS specific registry.
      Parameters:
      file - the file or null to remove the path
